title: Add Two Numbers
description: Write a program that reads two integers from a single line of input, separated by a space, and prints their sum. This exercise helps you practice reading input, converting strings to integers, and using the print function.
hints: Use input() to read a line from standard input.
Split the input string with .split() to get the two numbers as separate strings.
Convert the strings to integers using int() or map(int, ...).
Print the result with the print() function.
